glsa.title: ModPlug: Multiple buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: ModPlug contains several boundary errors that could lead to buffer overflows resulting in the possible execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: ModPlug is a library for playing MOD-like music.

description.p: Luigi Auriemma has reported various boundary errors in load_it.cpp and a boundary error in the "CSoundFile::ReadSample()" function in sndfile.cpp.

impact.p: A remote attacker can entice a user to read crafted modules or ITP files, which may trigger a buffer overflow resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ModPlug users should upgrade to the latest version:
